description: HTML file for a web-based database viewer interface, including embedded CSS styles and JavaScript code for fetching and displaying database, table, and data information with interactivity.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resets current selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands/collapses database entry to show/hide tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates HTML for a table cell, handling objects, nulls, and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long or object data.
